name: Company Analysis
description: Comprehensive analysis of a company's fundamentals and performance

params.request: Get complete fundamentals for {SYMBOL}: financials, ratios, earnings, revenue

params.user_input: Analyze {SYMBOL} with fundamentals {digested_data}, peer companies {peer_companies.data}, and supply chain {supply_chain.data}. Apply Buffett-Ackman-Dalio framework. Provide: 1) Business quality score 2) Valuation vs peers 3) Competitive position analysis 4) Supply chain risks 5) Growth prospects 6) Investment recommendation with peer comparison
